item.title: BYD will accept liability if one of its self-parking cars crashes
item.description: The Chinese EV-maker BYD says it will pay for any damage caused by its upgraded self-parking system, as reported earlier by Fast Company. A translated version of BYD’s announcement on Weibo says the c
